fixes.name: Dynamic Age Group
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR AgeValue = VALUE('test+'[Age])
VAR CutValue = SELECTEDVALUE('Age Cut Value'[Display As])
RETURN IF(AgeValue <= CutValue, "Young", "Adult")
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau IF to DAX IF(). Mapped the Tableau parameter to SELECTEDVALUE('Age Cut Value'[Display As]). Because 'test+'[Age] is defined as a string, cast it to numeric with VALUE() before comparison. Returns "Young" or "Adult" accordingly and implemented as a measure due to the parameter reference.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references a Tableau parameter ([Parameters].[Age Cut Value]); per rules, parameter-based calculations must be created as measures.
